oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE EVOLUTION TREND OF A BEACH IN CONSEQUENCE OF THE BUILDING OF COASTAL STRUCTURES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Filianoti, Pasquale
Gurnari, Luana
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The shoreline deformation produced by the interaction between waves and coastal structures have been analyzed by comparing two different analytical solutions. Starting from the same assumption, they converge to different profiles, according to the different way to take in account the phenomenon of the wave diffraction induced by the structure.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 37 (2022): Proceedings of 37th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Sydney, Australia, 2022; sediment.68
